title: Crestline Hotels & Resorts Premieres a New Look as the Company Marks a Year of Exceptional Growth
text:
Crestline Hotels & Resorts Premieres a New Look as the Company Marks a Year of Exceptional Growth July 06, 2015 18:00 ET | Source: Crestline Hotels & Resorts 
FAIRFAX, Va., July 6,   Crestline Hotels & Resorts, LLC (Crestline) marks its 15 th year in hospitality management with a new logo and a dynamic new look to its website ( www.crestlinehotels.com ). The re-creation and refresh of the Company's branding and website complements Crestline's growth and its maturation as an innovative and forward-looking world-class hospitality management company. 
As one of the nation's largest independent hospitality management companies, Crestline's rapidly growing portfolio currently includes 75 hotels with more than 12,200 rooms in 20 states and the District of Columbia. Founded in 2000, Crestline's portfolio of properties includes many branded by Marriott, Hilton, Starwood, IHG and Hyatt, as well as independent private label hotels and conference centers. Its collection of properties ranges from upscale select-service to upper upscale full-service properties, and most of its hotels hold a leading position within their market segmentation. 
"Our new logo is intended to be a visual representation of Crestline's commitment to partnership, forward momentum, and the power of our people," said James Carroll, Crestline's President & CEO. "We are a company which is successfully driven by that momentum, along with a genuine relationship with our owners, partners, and associates; we are also a leader and contributor in the communities in which we do business. It is these factors which define our success and make us a preferred partner among the leading hospitality industry owners and REITs. We pride ourselves on our vision and our ability to evolve our management practices to ensure we are consistently at the forefront of our ever-changing industry," added Carroll. 
For more information about Crestline Hotels & Resorts, LLC, and to see our new website, visit www.crestlinehotels.com .
